headline.main: Hong Kong Teen Faces Trial Over Pro-Democracy Protest
headline.print_headline: Hong Kong Teen Faces Trial Over Pro-Democracy Protest

docs.snippet: Hong Kong teenage student leader Joshua Wong is set to face trial on charges relating to his role in storming government headquarters nearly a year ago in a protest that sparked monthslong pro-democracy street occupations....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hong Kong teenage student leader Joshua Wong is set to face trial on charges relating to his role in storming government headquarters nearly a year ago in a protest that sparked monthslong pro-democracy street occupations.

headline.main: Review: ‘A Walk in the Woods,’ With Robert Redford, Is a Scenic Trek Spoiled

docs.snippet: Mr. Redford stars with Nick Nolte in this film based on Bill Bryson’s 1998 chronicle of hiking the Appalachian Trail with an old friend....
docs.abstract: Manohla Dargis reviews movie A Walk in the Woods, directed by Ken Kwapis and starring Robert Redford and Nick Nolte.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Redford stars with Nick Nolte in this film based on Bill Bryson’s 1998 chronicle of hiking the Appalachian Trail with an old friend.

headline.main: Japan Lawmakers Urge Bourse, Regulators to Be Tough on Toshiba
headline.print_headline: Japan Lawmakers Urge Bourse, Regulators to Be Tough on Toshiba

docs.snippet: Toshiba Corp's second postponement of its annual results due to newfound accounting errors should be met with a tough response from regulators, Japanese lawmakers urged on Wednesday....

headline.main: Australia Coach Backtracks in Pay Dispute Row
headline.print_headline: Australia Coach Backtracks in Pay Dispute Row

docs.snippet: Australia coach Ange Postecoglou has backtracked on critical comments and toed the party line of his employers Football Federation Australia (FFA) on a pay dispute that led to his players boycotting commitments....

headline.main: Ruf Has 6 RBIs, Phils Win 14-8 to End 10-Game Skid vs Mets
headline.print_headline: Ruf Has 6 RBIs, Phils Win 14-8 to End 10-Game Skid vs Mets

docs.snippet: Darin Ruf homered and had a career-high six RBIs, powering the Philadelphia Phillies to a 14-8 blowout Tuesday night that emphatically ended their 10-game losing streak to the New York Mets....
docs.lead_paragraph: Darin Ruf homered and had a career-high six RBIs, powering the Philadelphia Phillies to a 14-8 blowout Tuesday night that emphatically ended their 10-game losing streak to the New York Mets.
